Text: I thought my converts didnr work on your p3 or xbox?\im using new codecs now though xvid 64 but mp2 is same except 48K not 44K now still 128 cbr

But its hit and miss alot with X264 format cause sometimes it may have a sound format xbox doesnt like and refuses to play , now you changed the sound setting it works perfect

regardless of IP
